pr_title: Fixed score calculation to use selected bits in the vector. Addresses…

timeline.message: Fixed score calculation to use selected bits in the vector. Addresses #2155
Added rule count for proper scoring implementation

timeline.author: tadgh

timeline.bodyText: This should be impossible now, no? e.g. 5 rules, all match, 5/5 == 1.0. I appreciate the gate, but I'm worried it may be masking potential insidious bugs. A score of >1 should be an error yeah?
timeline.author: tadgh

replies.bodyText: Or at least normalized down with a big warning log if we don't want to call it an error
replies.author: tadgh

replies.bodyText: Makes perfect sense. Current code adds unnecessary complexity. Updated
replies.author: nvg-smile

timeline.message: Updated based on code review feedback
